surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

Lanyu or Orchid Island township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan

sentences.english: Comparisons with our previous studies on the Yami children were included in the present report.
sentences.chinese: 本报告中亦包括与兰屿学童调查结果之比较。

sentences.english: Tingtzu loincloths are traditional garb for Yami males on Orchid Island.
sentences.chinese: 丁字裤是兰屿雅美男人的传统服装。

sentences.english: Back in 1969, Lanyu was a rather desolate place.
sentences.chinese: 兰屿岛在当时是很荒凉的孤岛。

sentences.english: We are the Yami people of Orchid Island.
Thus, we become friends, and he took me played around the island, eating the seafood that tourist won't have chance to eat.
sentences.chinese: 于是朋友便交上了，之后更一起在兰屿吃喝玩乐。

sentences.english: Reviving the music of the Orchid Islands; a feast, lasting the whole night, from dusk til dawn.
sentences.chinese: 原音重现兰屿音乐夜宴，通宵达旦到天明。

sentences.english: A list of plants of Dr. Y. Yamamoto's last collection.
sentences.chinese: 故山本由松博士最后一次兰屿采集植物目录。

sentences.english: But the charge of electric power for the self-used houses of the residents in Lanyu shall be exempted.
sentences.chinese: 但兰屿地区住民自用住宅之用电费用应予免收。

sentences.english: The Yami, who live on Orchid6 Island, are especially famous for their handmade boats.
sentences.chinese: 居住在兰屿的雅美族尤其以手工造船出名。

sentences.english: Lanyu is an island off the coast of Taitung.
sentences.chinese: 兰屿是台东海岸附近的一个岛屿。
